description.value:
You gain a tattoo that serves as a special ward to defend you against Walkena's forces.

The tattoo allows you to cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Light] cantrip as a divine innate spell at will. The cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. If you die, the tattoo immediately casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gentle Repose] on your corpse, heightened to the same spell level.
